song.englishname: All Flesh Is Like the Grass (I Peter 1:24-25)

english.segment1: All flesh is like the grass. The grass withers and fades away. All flesh is like the grass. The grass withers and fades away
english.segment2: The glory of man, like a flower. That shrivels in the sun and falls. The glory of man, like a flower. That shrivels in the sun and falls
english.segment3: But the Word of the Lord. Endures forever. The Word of the Lord. Endures forever
